title: Biden, in Midterm Campaign Pitch, Focuses on Social Security and Medicare
description: At events in Florida, the president sought to paint Republicans as a threat to the two retirement programs. But his campaign swing did not go without bumps.
dc:creator: Peter Baker

media:content.media:credit: Tom Brenner for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: “You’ve been paying into Social Security your whole life,” President Biden told an audience at O.B. Johnson Park in Hallandale Beach, Fla., on Tuesday, warning that Republicans “want to take it away.”
